source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casemarking_grouped

    AS

SELECT id,
case_reference,
overall_mark,
amendments_timeliness_mark,
complexity,
conditions_mark,
conditions_detail,
coverage_mark,
coverage_detail,
ground_a_mark,
ground_a_iit_level,
invalid_nullity,
invalid_nullity_mark,
legal_grounds_mark,
legal_grounds_considered,
non_legal_grounds_mark,
non_legal_grounds_considered,
other_grounds_affecting_complexity,
outcome,
overall_case_level_for_iit_progression,
presentation_accuracy_mark,
presentation_accuracy_detail,
structure_reasoning_mark,
structure_reasoning_detail,
timeliness_mark,
reading_complete_notification_needed,
expected_from

FROM odw_standardised_db.checkmark_case_marking
Where id is not null
GROUP BY id,
case_reference,
overall_mark,
amendments_timeliness_mark,
complexity,
conditions_mark,
conditions_detail,
coverage_mark,
coverage_detail,
ground_a_mark,
ground_a_iit_level,
invalid_nullity,
invalid_nullity_mark,
legal_grounds_mark,
legal_grounds_considered,
non_legal_grounds_mark,
non_legal_grounds_considered,
other_grounds_affecting_complexity,
outcome,
overall_case_level_for_iit_progression,
presentation_accuracy_mark,
presentation_accuracy_detail,
structure_reasoning_mark,
structure_reasoning_detail,
timeliness_mark,
reading_complete_notification_needed,
expected_from

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (checkmark) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.comment_fact)
- **New Data:** where a CasemarkingID in the source does not exist as an id in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on CasemarkingID in source and id in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an id in the target exists but the same CasemarkingID doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View comment_type_reference_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build comment_type_reference_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casemarking_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.id IS NULL
        THEN T3.CasemarkingDimID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                         AS CasemarkingDimID, -- surrogate key
    T1.id                                       AS CasemarkingID,
    T1.case_reference                           AS CaseReference,
    T1.overall_mark                             AS OverallMark,
    T1.amendments_timeliness_mark               AS AmendmentsTimeliness,
    T1.complexity                               AS Complexity,
    T1.conditions_mark                          AS ConditionsMark,
    T1.conditions_detail                        AS ConditionsDetail,
    T1.coverage_mark                            AS CoverageMark,
    T1.coverage_detail                          AS CoverageDetail,
    T1.ground_a_mark                            AS GroundAMark,
    T1.ground_a_iit_level                       AS GroundAIITLevel,
    T1.invalid_nullity                          AS InvalidNullity,
    T1.invalid_nullity_mark                     AS InvalidNullityMark,
    T1.legal_grounds_mark                       AS LegalGroundsMark,
    T1.legal_grounds_considered                 AS LegalGroundsConsidered,
    T1.non_legal_grounds_mark                   AS NonLegalGroundsMark,
    T1.non_legal_grounds_considered             AS NonLegalGroundsConsidered,
    T1.other_grounds_affecting_complexity       AS OtherGroundsAffectingComplexity,
    T1.outcome                                  AS Outcome,
    T1.overall_case_level_for_iit_progression   AS OverallCaseLevelForIITProgression,
    T1.presentation_accuracy_mark               AS PresentationAccuracyMark,
    T1.presentation_accuracy_detail             AS PresentationAccuracyDetail,
    T1.structure_reasoning_mark                 AS StructureReasoningMark,
    T1.structure_reasoning_detail               AS StructureReasoningDetail,
    T1.timeliness_mark                          AS TimelinessMark,
    T1.reading_complete_notification_needed     AS ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,    
    T2.SourceSystemID                           AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)              AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                        AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.overall_mark,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.amendments_timeliness_mark,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.complexity,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.conditions_mark,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.conditions_detail,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.coverage_mark,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.coverage_detail,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.ground_a_mark,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.ground_a_iit_level,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.invalid_nullity,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.invalid_nullity_mark,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.legal_grounds_mark,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.legal_grounds_considered,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.non_legal_grounds_mark,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.non_legal_grounds_considered,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.other_grounds_affecting_complexity,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.outcome,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.overall_case_level_for_iit_progression,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.presentation_accuracy_mark,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.presentation_accuracy_detail,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.structure_reasoning_mark,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.structure_reasoning_detail,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.timeliness_mark,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.reading_complete_notification_needed,'.')
            )
        )                                       AS RowID,
    'Y'                                         AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                                 AS HistoricIsActive

FROM casemarking_grouped T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON "Checkmark" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_dim T3 
    ON T1.id = T3.CasemarkingID 
        AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T1.ID = T3.CasemarkingID 
            AND md5(
                concat(
                    IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.overall_mark,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.amendments_timeliness_mark,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.complexity,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.conditions_mark,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.conditions_detail,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.coverage_mark,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.coverage_detail,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.ground_a_mark,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.ground_a_iit_level,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.invalid_nullity,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.invalid_nullity_mark,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.legal_grounds_mark,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.legal_grounds_considered,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.non_legal_grounds_mark,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.non_legal_grounds_considered,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.other_grounds_affecting_complexity,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.outcome,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.overall_case_level_for_iit_progression,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.presentation_accuracy_mark,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.presentation_accuracy_detail,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.structure_reasoning_mark,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.structure_reasoning_detail,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.timeliness_mark,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.reading_complete_notification_needed,'.'))) <> T3.RowID
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.CasemarkingID IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.id IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM casemarking_grouped)

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View _dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW casemarking_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    CasemarkingDimID, -- surrogate key
    CasemarkingID,
    CaseReference,
    OverallMark,
    AmendmentsTimeliness,
    Complexity,
    ConditionsMark,
    ConditionsDetail,
    CoverageMark,
    CoverageDetail,
    GroundAMark,
    GroundAIITLevel,
    InvalidNullity,
    InvalidNullityMark,
    LegalGroundsMark,
    LegalGroundsConsidered,
    NonLegalGroundsMark,
    NonLegalGroundsConsidered,
    OtherGroundsAffectingComplexity,
    Outcome,
    OverallCaseLevelForIITProgression,
    PresentationAccuracyMark,
    PresentationAccuracyDetail,
    StructureReasoningMark,
    StructureReasoningDetail,
    TimelinessMark,
    ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From casemarking_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    CasemarkingDimID,
    CasemarkingID,
    CaseReference,
    OverallMark,
    AmendmentsTimeliness,
    Complexity,
    ConditionsMark,
    ConditionsDetail,
    CoverageMark,
    CoverageDetail,
    GroundAMark,
    GroundAIITLevel,
    InvalidNullity,
    InvalidNullityMark,
    LegalGroundsMark,
    LegalGroundsConsidered,
    NonLegalGroundsMark,
    NonLegalGroundsConsidered,
    OtherGroundsAffectingComplexity,
    Outcome,
    OverallCaseLevelForIITProgression,
    PresentationAccuracyMark,
    PresentationAccuracyDetail,
    StructureReasoningMark,
    StructureReasoningDetail,
    TimelinessMark,
    ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive  
FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_dim
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM casemarking_dim_new WHERE CasemarkingID IS NULL)
AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM casemarking_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casemarking_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    CasemarkingDimID,
    CasemarkingID,
    CaseReference,
    OverallMark,
    AmendmentsTimeliness,
    Complexity,
    ConditionsMark,
    ConditionsDetail,
    CoverageMark,
    CoverageDetail,
    GroundAMark,
    GroundAIITLevel,
    InvalidNullity,
    InvalidNullityMark,
    LegalGroundsMark,
    LegalGroundsConsidered,
    NonLegalGroundsMark,
    NonLegalGroundsConsidered,
    OtherGroundsAffectingComplexity,
    Outcome,
    OverallCaseLevelForIITProgression,
    PresentationAccuracyMark,
    PresentationAccuracyDetail,
    StructureReasoningMark,
    StructureReasoningDetail,
    TimelinessMark,
    ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM casemarking_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View _dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e.  from Personal Characteristics), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised._dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_dim AS Target
USING casemarking_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.CasemarkingDimID = Target.CasemarkingDimID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (CasemarkingDimID,
        CasemarkingID,
        CaseReference,
        OverallMark,
        AmendmentsTimeliness,
        Complexity,
        ConditionsMark,
        ConditionsDetail,
        CoverageMark,
        CoverageDetail,
        GroundAMark,
        GroundAIITLevel,
        InvalidNullity,
        InvalidNullityMark,
        LegalGroundsMark,
        LegalGroundsConsidered,
        NonLegalGroundsMark,
        NonLegalGroundsConsidered,
        OtherGroundsAffectingComplexity,
        Outcome,
        OverallCaseLevelForIITProgression,
        PresentationAccuracyMark,
        PresentationAccuracyDetail,
        StructureReasoningMark,
        StructureReasoningDetail,
        TimelinessMark,
        ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.CasemarkingDimID,
        Source.CasemarkingID,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.OverallMark,
        Source.AmendmentsTimeliness,
        Source.Complexity,
        Source.ConditionsMark,
        Source.ConditionsDetail,
        Source.CoverageMark,
        Source.CoverageDetail,
        Source.GroundAMark,
        Source.GroundAIITLevel,
        Source.InvalidNullity,
        Source.InvalidNullityMark,
        Source.LegalGroundsMark,
        Source.LegalGroundsConsidered,
        Source.NonLegalGroundsMark,
        Source.NonLegalGroundsConsidered,
        Source.OtherGroundsAffectingComplexity,
        Source.Outcome,
        Source.OverallCaseLevelForIITProgression,
        Source.PresentationAccuracyMark,
        Source.PresentationAccuracyDetail,
        Source.StructureReasoningMark,
        Source.StructureReasoningDetail,
        Source.TimelinessMark,
        Source.ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) 
;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised._dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new ID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CasemarkingDimID NULLS LAST) AS CasemarkingDimID,
    CasemarkingID,
    CaseReference,
    OverallMark,
    AmendmentsTimeliness,
    Complexity,
    ConditionsMark,
    ConditionsDetail,
    CoverageMark,
    CoverageDetail,
    GroundAMark,
    GroundAIITLevel,
    InvalidNullity,
    InvalidNullityMark,
    LegalGroundsMark,
    LegalGroundsConsidered,
    NonLegalGroundsMark,
    NonLegalGroundsConsidered,
    OtherGroundsAffectingComplexity,
    Outcome,
    OverallCaseLevelForIITProgression,
    PresentationAccuracyMark,
    PresentationAccuracyDetail,
    StructureReasoningMark,
    StructureReasoningDetail,
    TimelinessMark,
    ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive  
FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_dim;
